main event: Four bright, disc-like objects were sighted traveling in the sky over Plainview, New York in the summer of 1963.
interesting points: The objects appeared highly reflective and shiny, and were very large in size.
The objects shifted positions, moving from in front of the witness to the east and into a diagonal line.
The objects were silent and appeared to simply disappear from sight.
The witness reported the sighting to the U.S. Air Force, but no photographs or physical evidence were included.

The Air Force was unable to conduct a meaningful investigation due to the time lapse, but stated that they have not found conclusive evidence of extraterrestrial visitations through Project Blue Book.
